root.name: Chef
root.description: GameplayMode A: In the main mode of Chef the player needs to juggle 3 different dishes in the air at the same time in order to flip them without letting it fall. Would a dish land on the floor a mouse comes by and snags it away. A dish is allowed to be snagged away twice before it is game over. On the left side of the screen there is a cat withÂ a fork that will sometimes keep the left most dish from falling down. Mode B: No info DSi Virtual Console Pricing Japan: 200 Points
